plot: Two street musicians befriend a dog whose owner is searching for his long-lost daughter: a good-hearted young lady who is also the street musicians' neighbor.
title: Qué perra vida
plot_es: Two street musicians befriend a dog whose owner is searching for his long-lost daughter: a good-hearted young lady who is also the street musicians' neighbor.
plot_en: Two street musicians befriend a dog whose owner is searching for his long-lost daughter: a good-hearted young lady who is also the street musicians' neighbor.
